generalInfo:
Meadows In The Mountains is like no other festival in the world. Nestled in the stunning heart of the Rhodopian Mountains near Bulgaria’s Greek border, set in an otherworldly and jaw-dropping setting that is unmatched anywhere on the planet.

A world away from other soul less festivals Meadows is a festival who’s uniquely intimate ethos is prominently made by it’s stunning setting and friendly people that attend not just the exquisite line up it presents.

A world away from other soul less festivals Meadows is a festival who’s uniquely intimate ethos is prominently made by it’s stunning setting and friendly people that attend not just the exquisite line up it presents.
typographyDescr: Moon Flower by Denise Bentulan is a free typeface very useful for a art projects. Pretty and easy to read.
creativeDescr:
PROJECT ASSIGNMENT: Design and develop a music festival event website.

PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION: The design of the website was made with custom hand drawings to recreate the atmosphere of the mountain area where the music festival took place. We combined the drawings using nice and smooth parallax animations to make the website alive and catchy. We also implemented custom booking integration and google map integration so that the visitors can find all available accommodations near the festival.

The website is easily accessible through all mobile devices allowing users to get the information they need for the festival anytime anywhere.

PROJECT DEVELOPED BY: XEC-Studio
